title: Annual report
context: [§340B-12] Annual report. Within twelve months from June 2, 1978, and annually thereafter, the board shall submit to the governor, through the director, a report summarizing the actions taken under this chapter, and the effectiveness of such actions and such information and recommendations, including legislative recommendations, as deemed appropriate. [L 1978, c 169, pt of §2] Revision Note &ldquo;June 2, 1978&rdquo; substituted for &ldquo;the effective date of this chapter&rdquo;.
